services.title: Progressive Web applications
services.description: Progressive web applications PWAs are websites that users can install directly on their devices. Their functionality is similar to native apps installed from appstrores i.e. Apple appstore, Playstore, Microsoft store etc. Any website that is running on HTTPS protocal can be converted in to a PWA. They are cross platform and can be installed in any device running Windows, Android, IOS, Mac OS, Linux and Chrome OS e.t.c. They can work without an internet connection, this allows users to access your content offline.
